entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a student at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is described as having regular nightmares about a graveyard.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend and classmate, also a student at Hogwarts. He has trouble remembering his dreams.

entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: A teacher at Hogwarts who is known for her ability to interpret dreams and the supernatural. She sets Harry and Ron a task related to dream interpretation.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are friends and classmates, as described in the text. They share a conversation about their dreams.
Harry is a student of Professor Trelawney's, as indicated by the text. She sets him and Ron a task related to dream interpretation.
Ron is also a student of Professor Trelawney's, as indicated by the text. She sets him and Harry a task related to dream interpretation.
